441990.name: Cobalt Demo
441990.description:
Forget everything you’ve learned about combat. Cobalt’s slo-mo mechanic lets you perform moves that other games can’t comprehend. Play a cute but slightly murderous cyborg with a passion for 2d multiplayer battles involving extreme slow-mo and bullet-deflecting combat rolls.

In this demo you’ll get a hefty slice of the Cobalt-pie without having to cough up the dough!
It’s a yummy win-win!

Cobalt is the brainchild of Oxeye Game Studio, which consists of Jens Bergensten, Daniel Brynolf, and Pontus Hammarberg. It’s published by Mojang.
